type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.TaskSelector
type.description: * Represents a {@link Launchable} that uses task name to select tasks executed from a given project and its sub-projects. This is * roughly equivalent to running `gradle <task-name>` from the command-line. * * @since 1.12

method.name: getName
method.description: * Returns the name that will be used to select tasks. * * @return The name used by this selector.

property.name: name
property.description: * Returns the name that will be used to select tasks. * * @return The name used by this selector.
